00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00081 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00082 {
00083     double ans = 0;
00084     int i;
00085 
00086     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00087     return ans;
00088 }
00089 
00098 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00099 {
00100     int i;
00101     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00102     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00103     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00104 }

00117 static R_INLINE double *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00118 {
00119     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00120     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;
00121 }

00131 static R_INLINE double
00132 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* d)
00133 {
00134     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? 
00135             sqrt(PWRSS(d)/ (dims[n_POS] -
00136                             (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))) : 1);
00137 }

00152 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00153 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00154 {
00155     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00156 
00157     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00158         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00159         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00160 
00161         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00162         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00163         nc[i] = nci;
00164         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00165     }
00166     return ans;
00167 }
00168 
00183 static int
00184 C_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00185        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00186 {
00187     int ans, i, p;
00188 
00189     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00190     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00191         int zrow = zi[p];
00192         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00193 
00194         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00195         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00196             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00197             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00198                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00199         }
00200     }
00201     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00202     return ans;
00203 }

00211 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00212 {
00213     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
00214         permP = GET_SLOT(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_LSym), lme4_permSym);
00215     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00216         *perm = INTEGER(permP), i, k,
00217         m = LENGTH(permP), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00218     double *b = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
00219         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)), one = 1;
00220     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00221     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00222     R_CheckStack(); 
00223 
00224     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00225                                 /* inverse permutation */
00226     for (i = 0; i < m; i++) b[perm[i]] = u[i];
00227     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00228         for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00229             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00230             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00231             for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00232         }
00233         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00234             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00235                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00236         }
00237     }
00238 }

00249 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00250 {
00251     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00252         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00253         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00254         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00255     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00256         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00257     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00258         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00259         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00260     R_CheckStack();
00261     
00262     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00263     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00264     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00265     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00266         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00267         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00268             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00269             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00270                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00271             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00272         }
00273     }
00274     return R_NilValue;
00275 }

00285 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00286 {
00287     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00288     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00289     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00290         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00291         double *st = REAL(STi);
00292         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00293         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00294 
00295         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00296             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00297         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00298             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00299                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00300     }
00301     return pars;
00302 }

00311 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00312 {
00313     SEXP ans =
00314         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00315                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00316     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00317     UNPROTECT(1); 
00318     return ans;
00319 }

00328 static void
00329 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00330 {
00331     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00332     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00333     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym)),
00334         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00335     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00336         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00337         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00338     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00339     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00340     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00341         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00342         one[] = {1,0};
00343     R_CheckStack();
00344 
00345     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00346                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00347     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00348         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00349         double *sti = st[i];
00350 
00351         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00352             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00353         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00354             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00355                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00356     }
00357                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00358                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00359     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00360     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00361         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00362         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00363             int pv = vp[j];
00364             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00365                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00366                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00367                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00368                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00369             }
00370         }
00371     }
00372                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00373     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00374         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00375             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00376                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00377 
00378                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00379                 else {
00380                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00381                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00382                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00383                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00384                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00385                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00386                 }
00387             }
00388                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00389     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00390         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00391         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00392     }
00393 }

00404 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00405 {
00406     int npar = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS];
00407 
00408     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00409         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00410     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00411     return R_NilValue;
00412 }

00422 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00423 {
00424     int w = asInteger(which),
00425         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00426                 
00427     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && dims[isREML_POS]), dims,
00428                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00429 }
00430 
00438 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00439 {
00440     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00441         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00442     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00443     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00444     int i, j, k;
00445     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00446     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00447     CHM_DN dm1;
00448     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00449     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00450         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00451     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00452     R_CheckStack();
00453 
00454     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00455     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00456     sc = get_sigma(dims[isREML_POS], dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)));
00457     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00458         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00459         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00460                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00461                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00462 
00463         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00464         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00465         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00466         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00467             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00468         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00469             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00470             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00471                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i]];
00472             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00473             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00474             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00475             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00476             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00477             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00478             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00479             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00480             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00481                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00482                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00483                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00484                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00485             }
00486         }
00487         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00488     }
00489     UNPROTECT(1);
00490     return ans;
00491 }
00492 
00500 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP C)
00501 {
00502     double one[] = {1, 0};
00503     int fll = c.final_ll;
00504     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(C);
00505     CHM_FR L;
00506     R_CheckStack();
00507 
00508     c.final_ll = 1;
00509     L = M_cholmod_analyze(cC, &c);
00510     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(cC, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00511         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00512               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00513     c.final_ll = fll;
00514 
00515     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00516 }

00518 
00519 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00520 
00521 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00522 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00523 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00524 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00525 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00526 
00527 
00537 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00538 {
00539     SEXP X = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
00540         moff = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00541         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00542     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00543     int i, ione = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
00544     int nans = n * dims[s_POS];
00545     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00546         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00547         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00548         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00549         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00550         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00551         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00552         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00553         one[] = {1,0};
00554     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00555     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00556     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, nans, 1),
00557         cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym));
00558     R_CheckStack();
00559 
00560                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00561     if (LENGTH(moff)) Memcpy(eta, REAL(moff), nans);
00562     else AZERO(eta, nans);
00563                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00564     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &nans, &p, one, REAL(X), &nans,
00565                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &ione,
00566                     one, eta, &ione);
00567                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00568     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00569     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00570         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00571     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00572 
00573     if (LENGTH(v)) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00574         SEXP rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym);
00575         SEXP gg, pnames = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pnamesSym), vv;
00576         int *gdims, s = dims[s_POS];
00577         
00578         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00579             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00580                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00581             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00582                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00583                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00584             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00585         }
00586         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00587         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00588             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00589         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00590         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00591             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00592         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00593         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00594             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00595                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00596                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00597                                  * pnames has been checked */
00598         SET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym, vv);
00599         UNPROTECT(1);
00600         eta = REAL(vv);
00601     }
00602                                 /* eta now points to an n vector  */
00603     if (muEta) {        /* apply the generalized linear part */
00604         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00605         case 1:                 /* binomial with logit link */
00606             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00607                 double etai = eta[i];
00608                 double tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00609                     ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00610                 mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00611                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00612             }
00613             break;
00614         case 2:                 /* binomial with probit link */
00615             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00616                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00617                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00618             }
00619             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00620                 double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00621                 mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00622                     ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00623                      pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00624                 var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00625                 tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00626                 muEta[i] =
00627                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00628             }
00629             break;
00630         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00631             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00632                 double tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00633                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] =
00634                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00635             }
00636             break;
00637         default:
00638             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00639         } 
00640     } else {
00641         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00642     }
00643 
00644     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00645     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00646         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (swt ? swt[i] : 1);
00647         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00648     }
00649                                 /* store u'u */
00650     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00651     
00652     return PWRSS(d);
00653 }
00654 
00665 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00666 {
00667     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00668 }
00669 
00680 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00681 {
00682     SEXP vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00683     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00684     int j, jv, lv = LENGTH(vP),
00685         n = dims[n_POS], p, s = dims[s_POS];
00686     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00687         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00688         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00689         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00690         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00691         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00692         one[] = {1,0};
00693     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00694     CHM_SP A = C;
00695     int *ai = (int*) NULL, *ap = (int*) NULL,
00696         *vi = (int*) C->i, *vp = (int*) C->p;
00697     double *ax = (double*) NULL, *vx = (double*) C->x;
00698     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00699     R_CheckStack();
00700 
00701     if (lv || muEta || swt) {   /* must generate A from C */
00702         A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00703         R_CheckStack();
00704         ai = (int*)(A->i); ap = (int*)(A->p); ax = (double*)(A->x);
00705         
00706         if (lv) { /* apply the gradient from the nonlinear model */
00707             double *grad = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
00708             
00709             AZERO(ax, ap[n]);
00710             for (jv = 0; jv < n * s; jv++) {
00711                 int iv, ja = jv % n, ia;
00712                 for (iv = vp[jv]; iv < vp[jv + 1]; iv++) {
00713                     for (ia = ap[ja]; ia < ap[ja + 1]; ia++)
00714                         if (ai[ia] == vi[iv]) break;
00715                     if (ia == ap[ja + 1])
00716                         error(_("Structure of A incompatible with C, jv = %d, iv = %d"),
00717                               jv, iv);
00718                     ax[ia] += grad[jv] * vx[iv];
00719                 }
00720             }
00721         } else {                /* copy contents of C to A */
00722             Memcpy(ax, vx, ap[n]);
00723         }
00724 
00725         if (swt) {              /* update swt and res. Apply swt and,
00726                                  * if used, muEta to A */
00727             double *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
00728                 *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym);
00729             d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00730             for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00731                 swt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / (var ? var[j] : 1));
00732                 res[j] = swt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00733                 d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00734                 for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00735                     ax[p] *= (muEta ? muEta[j] : 1) * swt[j];
00736             }
00737         }
00738     }
00739 
00740     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00741         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00742               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00743     /* evaluate the logarithm of the square of the determinant of L */
00744     d[ldL2_POS] = 0;
00745     if (L->is_super) {
00746         int i;
00747         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00748             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00749                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00750             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00751 
00752             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00753                 d[ldL2_POS] += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00754             }
00755         }
00756     } else {
00757         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00758         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00759         
00760         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00761             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00762             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00763             d[ldL2_POS] += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00764         }
00765     }
00766     return PWRSS(d);
00767 }
00768 
00780 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00781 {
00782     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00783 }
00784 
00786 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00787 
00788 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00789 
00790 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00791 
00801 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00802 {
00803     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00804     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00805     double
00806         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00807         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)),
00808         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00809         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, one[] = {1,0},
00810         step, zero[] = {0,0};
00811     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double),
00812         *uold = Alloca(q, double);
00813     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00814     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00815         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00816     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00817     R_CheckStack();
00818 
00819     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00820     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00821 
00822     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00823      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00824      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00825      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00826 
00827     AZERO(u, q);
00828     update_mu(x);
00829     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00830 
00831         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00832         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00833                                 /* tmp := A %*% W^{1/2} %*% (y-mu) */
00834         if (!(M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 0 /* no trans */, one, zero,
00835                                cres, ctmp, &c))) 
00836             error(_("cholmod_sdmult returned error code"));
00837                                 /* tmp := P %*% tmp - u */
00838         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_P, L, ctmp, &c);
00839         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] = ((double*)(sol->x))[j] - u[j];
00840         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00841                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
00842         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
00843             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
00844         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00845         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00846                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
00847         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
00848         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
00849                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
00850         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
00851             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
00852         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00853         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00854 
00855         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
00856             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
00857             pwrss = update_mu(x);
00858             if (verb < 0)
00859                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
00860                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
00861             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
00862                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
00863                 break;
00864             }
00865         }
00866         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
00867     }
00868     return i;
00869 }
00870 
00882 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
00883 {
00884     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
00885 }
00886 
00895 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00896 {
00897     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00898 }
00899 
00907 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
00908 {
00909     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
00910     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00911     int i, n = dims[n_POS];
00912 
00913     d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
00914     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) { /* generalized */
00915         SEXP pwtp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
00916         int pw = LENGTH(pwtp);
00917         double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00918             *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00919             *wts = REAL(pwtp),
00920             *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym));
00921 
00922         d[disc_POS] = 0;
00923         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00924         case 1:               /* binomial with logit or probit link */
00925         case 2:
00926             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00927                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00928                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00929                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00930             }
00931             break;
00932         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00933             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00934                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00935                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00936                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00937             }
00938             break;
00939         default:
00940             error(_("General form of glmer_dev_resids not yet written"));
00941         }
00942     }
00943 
00944     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00945     return R_NilValue;
00946 }
00947 
00956 SEXP mer_update_effects(SEXP x)
00957 {
00958     SEXP muEta = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00959         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00960     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00961     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00962     R_CheckStack();
00963 
00964     if (!(LENGTH(muEta) || LENGTH(v))) { /* linear mixed model */
00965         SEXP uvec = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
00966         int ione = 1, p = dims[p_POS], pp1 = dims[p_POS] + 1,
00967             q = dims[q_POS];
00968         double *RXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
00969             *RCXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)),
00970             *dev = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00971             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
00972             *u = REAL(uvec), mone = -1, one = 1;
00973         CHM_DN cu = AS_CHM_DN(uvec), sol;
00974         R_CheckStack();
00975 
00976         Memcpy(fixef, RXy + p * pp1, p);
00977         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RXy, &pp1, fixef, &ione);
00978         Memcpy(u, RCXy + p * q, q);
00979         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, RCXy, &q,
00980                         fixef, &ione, &one, u, &ione);
00981         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00982             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00983         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00984         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00985         dev[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00986         dev[disc_POS] = exp(dev[lpdisc_POS]) - dev[usqr_POS];
00987     }
00988     update_ranef(x);
00989     return R_NilValue;
00990 }
00991 
01003 SEXP mer_create_C(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01004 {
01005     SEXP ans;
01006     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01007         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01008     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01009     R_CheckStack();
01010 
01011                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01012     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01013         return duplicate(Zt);
01014                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01015     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01016     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01017     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01018     R_CheckStack();
01019 
01020     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01021     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01022     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01023         nnz[j] = C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01024         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01025     }
01026     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01027                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01028     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01029     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01030     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01031                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01032     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01033     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01034     vp[0] = 0;
01035     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01036     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01037                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01038     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01039     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01040     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01041         int i, pos = vp[j];
01042         C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01043         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01044     }
01045                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01046     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01047     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01048 
01049     UNPROTECT(1); 
01050     return ans;
01051 }
01052 
01063 static void
01064 PAWv(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01065      const double *swt, const double *v)
01066 {
01067     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), j, k,
01068         n = A->ncol, p, q = A->nrow;
01069     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(q, double);
01070     R_CheckStack();
01071 
01072     AZERO(tmp, q);
01073     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01074         double mm = v[j] * (swt ? swt[j] : 1);
01075         for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01076             tmp[ai[p]] += mm * ax[p];
01077     }
01078     for (k = 0; k < q; k++)     /* apply the permutation */
01079         dest[k] = tmp[perm ? perm[k] : k];
01080 }
01081 
01096 static void
01097 weighted_XytXy(double *rxy, const double *swt, double *X,
01098                double *y, int n, int p)
01099 {
01100     int i, ione = 1, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01101     double one = 1, zero = 0;
01102     double *Xcp = X, *ycp = y;
01103     
01104     if (swt) {                  /* created weighted copies of X and y */
01105         Xcp = Alloca(n * p, double),
01106         ycp = Alloca(n, double);
01107         R_CheckStack();
01108         
01109         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ycp[i] = swt[i] * y[i];
01110         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01111             for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01112                 Xcp[i + j * n] = swt[i] * X[i + j * n];
01113     }
01114     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, &one, Xcp, &n, &zero, rxy, &pp1);
01115     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, &one, Xcp, &n, ycp, &ione, &zero,
01116                     rxy + p * pp1, &ione);
01117     rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1] = F77_CALL(ddot)(&n, ycp, &ione, ycp, &ione);
01118 }
01119         
01127 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01128 {
01129     SEXP RCXyP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym),
01130         vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
01131     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01132     int i, j, k, lv = LENGTH(vP), n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
01133     int np = n * p, q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS], pp1 = p + 1;
01134     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym));
01135     double *Xcp = X, *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01136         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01137         *rcxy = REAL(RCXyP),
01138         *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01139         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
01140         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01141         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01142         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01143     CHM_SP A =
01144         AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, (swt || lv) ? lme4_ASym : lme4_CmSym));
01145     CHM_DN cRCXy = AS_CHM_DN(RCXyP), ans;
01146     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01147     R_CheckStack();
01148 
01149     update_L(x);
01150     if (lv || muEta) {          /* Create Xcp = G^{-1} %*% H %*% X */
01151         Xcp = Alloca(np, double);
01152         R_CheckStack();
01153 
01154         if (lv) {               /* Xcp = H %*% X */
01155             double *H = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
01156 
01157             AZERO(Xcp, np);
01158             for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01159                 for (k = 0; k < s; k++)
01160                     for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01161                         Xcp[j * n + i] += X[n * (j * s + k) + i] * H[k * n + i];
01162         } else {
01163             Memcpy(Xcp, X, np); /* Xcp = X */
01164         }
01165         if (muEta) {            /* Xcp := G^{-1} %*% Xcp */
01166             for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01167                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01168                     Xcp[j * n + i] *= muEta[i];
01169         }
01170     }
01171                                 /* Evaluate PAW^{1/2}[X:y] in RCXy */
01172     for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01173         PAWv(rcxy + j * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, Xcp + j * n);
01174     PAWv(rcxy + p * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, y);
01175                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01176     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRCXy, &c);
01177     Memcpy(rcxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * pp1);
01178     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01179                                 /* downdate XytXy  */
01180                                 /* Evaluate [X:y]'W[X:y] in RXy */
01181     weighted_XytXy(rxy, swt, Xcp, y, n, p);
01182     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &pp1, &q, mone, rcxy, &q, one, rxy, &pp1);
01183     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &pp1, rxy, &pp1, &j);
01184     if (j)
01185         error(_("Downdated [X:y]'[X:y] is not positive definite, %d."),
01186               j);
01187     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < (pp1 - 1); j++)
01188         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (pp1 + 1)]);
01189     /* update other elements of the deviance slot for LMMs */
01190     if ((!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) &&
01191         (!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym)))) {
01192         d[lpdisc_POS] = 2 * log(rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1]);
01193         d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01194             dn * (1 + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2 * PI / dn));
01195         d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01196             dnmp * (1. + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01197     }
01198     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01199 }
01200 
01208 SEXP
01209 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01210 {
01211     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01212 }
01213 
01223 SEXP 
01224 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01225 {
01226     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01227     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01228         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01229     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01230                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym))),
01231         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01232 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe). */
01233     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01234     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01235     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01236     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01237     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01238     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01239         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01240     R_CheckStack();
01241 
01242     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01243     if (!lmm) {
01244         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01245 
01246         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01247         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01248         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01249         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01250     }
01251                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01252     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01253     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01254                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01255     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01256         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01257     }
01258                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01259     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01260         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01261         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01262         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01263     }
01264     do {
01265         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01266         if (lmm)
01267             fx = update_RX(x);
01268         else {
01269             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01270             update_u(x, verb);
01271             mer_update_dev(x);
01272             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01273         }
01274         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01275     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01276     update_RX(x);
01277     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01278     return R_NilValue;
01279 }
01280 
01281 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01282 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01283 
01296 static double
01297 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01298 {
01299     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01300 
01301     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01302         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01303     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01304         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01305         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01306             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01307                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01308             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01309             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01310         }
01311     }
01312     return ans;
01313 }
01314 
01324 SEXP
01325 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01326 {
01327     SEXP ans;
01328     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01329         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01330     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01331 
01332     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01333         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01334     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01335     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01336     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01337     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01338     R_CheckStack();
01339 
01340     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01341     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01342     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01343     if (j)
01344         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01345     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01346     ansp = REAL(ans);
01347     GetRNGstate();
01348     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01349         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01350         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01351         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01352                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01353         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01354                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01355                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01356 
01357         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01358             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01359                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01360     }
01361 
01362     PutRNGstate();
01363     UNPROTECT(1);
01364     return ans;
01365 }
01366 
01367 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01368 
01376 static void MCMC_beta(SEXP x, double sigma)
01377 {
01378     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01379         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01380     int ione = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01381     int pp1 = p + 1;
01382     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01383     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01384     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01385     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01386     R_CheckStack();
01387 
01388     mer_update_effects(x);
01389                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01390     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01391     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01392                     &pp1, del2, &ione);
01393     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01394                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01395     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01396     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)),
01397                     &q, del2, &ione, &one, del1, &ione);
01398     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01399     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01400     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01401                                 /* Update the random effects */
01402     update_ranef(x);
01403 }
01404 
01413 static void MCMC_u(SEXP x, double sigma)
01414 {
01415 }
01416 
01417 static void
01418 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01419 {
01420     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01421     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01422         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01423         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01424 
01425     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01426     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01427     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01428     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01429         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01430         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01431         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01432     }
01433 }
01434 
01435 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01436 {
01437     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01438     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01439         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01440     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01441         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01442     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01443     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01444     R_CheckStack();
01445 
01446     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01447     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01448     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01449     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01450     R_CheckStack();
01451     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01452         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01453         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01454         
01455         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01456         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01457                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01458         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01459         else {
01460             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01461             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01462             if (info)
01463                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01464         }
01465                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01466         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01467         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01468                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01469         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01470                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01471         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01472                         &zero, var, &nci);
01473         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01474             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01475         }
01476         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01477             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01478                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01479                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01480                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01481             }
01482         }
01483         if (nci == 1) {
01484             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01485         } else {
01486             double *sti = st[i];
01487 
01488             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01489                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01490                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01491                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01492             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01493             if (info)
01494                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01495             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01496                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01497                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01498                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01499             }
01500         }
01501     }
01502 }
01503 
01513 static R_INLINE double MCMC_sigma(const int* dims, const double* d)
01514 {
01515     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? sqrt(PWRSS(d)/rchisq(RDF(dims))) : 1);
01516 }
01517 
01530 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01531                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01532 {
01533     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01534     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01535     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01536         nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01537         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01538         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01539         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01540     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01541         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01542         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01543         *ranef = (double*)NULL;
01544     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01545     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01546 
01547     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01548     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01549     ansp = REAL(ans);
01550     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01551     GetRNGstate();
01552     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01553     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01554 
01555     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01556         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01557                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01558         sigma = MCMC_sigma(dims, d);
01559         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01560         mer_update_effects(x);  /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01561         MCMC_beta(x, sigma);    /* Update beta */
01562         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01563         MCMC_u(x, sigma);
01564         if (saveb) {                               /* store b */
01565             update_ranef(x);
01566             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01567         }
01568         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01569 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     */ /* Refactor and evaluate deviance */
01570         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01571         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01572         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01573     }
01574     PutRNGstate();
01575                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01576     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01577 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01578 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01579     UNPROTECT(2);
01580     return ans;
01581 }
01582 
01583 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01584 
01585 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01586 #endif  
01587 
01601 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01602 {
01603     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01604     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01605     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01606         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01607                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01608                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01609     return 0;
01610 }
01611 
01624 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01625 {
01626     int ll;
01627 
01628     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01629         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01630                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01631     return 0;
01632 }
01633 
01642 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01643 {
01644     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01645         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01646         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01647         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01648         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym);
01649     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01650     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01651         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01652     int nv = n * s, pp1 = p + 1;
01653     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01654         C =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01655     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01656     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01657     R_CheckStack();
01658                                 /* check lengths */
01659     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01660         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01661     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01662         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01663     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01664         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01665     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01666         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01667         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01668     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01669         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01670         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01671     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01672         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01673     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01674         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01675     if (C->nrow != q || C->ncol != nv)
01676         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01677     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01678     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01679     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01680     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01681     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01682     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_priorWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01683     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01684     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01685     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01686     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uvecSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01687     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_vSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01688     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01689     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01690     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01691     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RCXySym, q, pp1)) return(mkString(buf));
01692     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXySym, pp1, pp1)) return(mkString(buf));
01693 
01694     nq = 0;
01695     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01696         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01697         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01698         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01699             return
01700                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01701         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01702             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01703         if (!isFactor(fli))
01704             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01705         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01706     }
01707     if (q != nq)
01708         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01709     return ScalarLogical(1);
01710 }
01711 
01712 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01713 
01723 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01724 {
01725     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01726     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01727         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01728         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01729         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01730         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01731     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01732 
01733     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01734     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01735     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01736         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01737         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01738             F[i] = 0;
01739             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01740         } else {
01741             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01742                 F[i] = 0;
01743                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01744             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01745                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01746                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01747                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01748                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01749                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01750                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01751                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01752                             int ii = ai[k];
01753                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01754                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01755                         }
01756                     }
01757                 }
01758             }
01759         }
01760         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01761     }
01762     return ans;
01763 }
01764 
01765 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01778 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01779 {
01780     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01781     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01782     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01783         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01784         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01785     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01786       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01787     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01788         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01789     R_CheckStack();
01790     
01791     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01792     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01793         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01794         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01795         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01796     }
01797     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01798     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01799     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01800     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01801         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01802         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01803                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01804         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01805         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01806             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01807         }
01808         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01809             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01810         }
01811     
01812         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01813         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01814         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01815         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01816             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01817             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01818             if (S) {
01819                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01820                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01821                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01822                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01823                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01824             }
01825             if (D) {
01826                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01827                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01828             }
01829             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01830             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01831             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01832                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01833                                       * evaluated */
01834         } 
01835     }
01836     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01837     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01838     UNPROTECT(1);
01839     return ans;
01840 }
